title: New Skins or Champion?
body:
Okay so if you look at the S@20 pbe patch notes you will see this splash art not sure if this is new skin or champion but Riot put (snuck) it into the notes by *accident*  probably(Not).
They seem to resemble Sivir and Garen.

replies.body: An Arbiter/Arclight Nautilus skin in progress would make sense considering the upcoming Arclight Vel'koz. However, I'm really not sure about that being Sivir. A skin like that just wouldn't suit the dessert bandit squishy. Who else could that weapon belong to though?

You realise that skins dont ever match the main theme of a champ, thats the point of skins so your logic is flawed, i think its sivir just thinking that they wouldnt make another female with shuriken/boomerang type weap, and the background i think should just be ignored as its not the focus of the splash
Sivir and Nautilus you mean. Garen doesn't have an anchor.

> [{quoted}](name=PRIMAWESOME,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2QEp3ATl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-17T09:13:40.795+0000)
>
> Sivir and Nautilus you mean. Garen doesn't have an anchor.

Right *facepalm*
Its a splash for galactic sivir and nautilus, if you compare this cover to other galactic skins there is similarities, mainly being the blue gems embedded in nauts anchor and sivirs waist
the file name is nidalee splash 7.
